title: LFT (ADC) - Currently G1 solo, P3 flex

embed.description: Atlas / Gold 1 49LP / 84W 87L Win Ratio 49% / Lucian - 26W 26L Win Ratio 50%, Jhin - 32W 16L Win Ratio 67%, Caitlyn - 25W 10L Win Ratio 71%, Xayah - 17W 16L Win Ratio 52%, Twitch - 8W 17L Win Ratio 32%

body: My username is Atlas and I'm looking to play with a team. I'm looking for chill players that prefer to play at night. I prefer discord but can use another voicechat is need be.
